results.title: Map
results.text: A crude map dwan on a scrap of tanned dinosaur hide showing a path from a random landmark or lair to Port Nyanzaru. (250GP)

results.title: Gemstones
results.text: $roll(1d4) gemstones in a small pouch. (10GP each)

results.title: Ring
results.text: Malachile ring inlaid with electrum. (50GP)

results.title: Empty Vial
results.text: An empty corked vial made from an aarakocra's engraved wing bone. (5GP)

results.title: Rotting Quiver
results.text: It contains $roll(1d10) silvered arrows.

results.title: Gold Nugget
results.text: The size of a dwarf's fist. (50GP)

results.title: Vial
results.text: A stoppered vial of serpent venom. (200GP)

results.title: Ivory Smoking Pipe
results.text: Engraved smoking pipe. (25GP)

results.title: Insect Repellent Case
results.text: Case containing $roll(2d12) blocks of insect repellent incense.

results.title: Iron Token
results.text: An iron token bearing the symbol of a triceratops. (The sign of the Ytepka Society). Worth 50GP in Pory Nyanzaru.

results.title: Potion of Animal Friendship
results.text: Can cast Animal Friendship (save DC13) at will for 1 hour.

results.title: Potion of Vitality
results.text: Removes exhaustion, cures diseases and poison. Get max hit points when expending HD.

results.title: Spell case
results.text: Random 1st level spell

results.title: Stoppered Vial
results.text: Wyvern poison. (1,200GP)

results.title: Obsidian Knife
results.text: Worth 25GP

results.title: Wooden Tube
results.text: A stoppered wooden tube containing $roll(1d4) gemstones. (50GP each)

results.title: Onyx Orb
results.text: A small onyx orb with a maze-like pattern carved on it. Usable as a druidic focus. (75GP)

results.title: Batiri Goblin Mask
results.text: A goblin mask made of painted wood set with nine gemstones. (10GP each)

results.title: Spyglass
results.text: Worth 1,000GP

results.title: Lute
results.text: Has a broken string. (35GP)

results.title: Thieves' Tools
results.text: Worth 25GP

results.title: Excellent Lock
results.text: An excellent lock without a key that requires a DC20 dex check to pick it using thieves tools. (50GP)

results.title: Jar of Keoghtom's Ointment
results.text: Cures poison and disease. Restores 2d8+2 hit points.

results.title: Horn of Blasting
results.text: Dangerous and powerful.

results.title: Wand of Secrets
results.text: Finds secret doors or traps.
